name: The Cutting Edge
description:
Overview

The Cutting Edge is a submission for VimJam 2.

Explore the mysterious world with the help of Edge Cutter in hopes to find out the truth behind your imprisonment.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Mouse - gun
Contributors:
  • MrBiggles (https://mrbiggles1.itch.io/) - code and art
  • Peter Previn (https://peter-previn.itch.io/) - music and sfx
  • Xaviarsly (https://itch.io/profile/xaviarsly) - vfx
  • akita_engineer (https://akita-engineer.itch.io) - code and design
